member.name: T:Nancy.ViewEngines.DotLiquid.DotLiquidRegistrations
member.summary:
Used to register the default naming conventions for the ViewEngine. The naming convention affects DotLiquid Drops and filters. See DotLiquid's documentation on the subject for more information.
This can be overridden in a bootstrapper.

member.name: M:Nancy.ViewEngines.DotLiquid.DotLiquidRegistrations.#ctor
member.summary: Register the RubyNamingConvention as the default.

member.name: T:Nancy.ViewEngines.DotLiquid.DotLiquidViewEngine
member.summary: View engine for rendering dotLiquid views.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Determines the DotLiquid naming convention that will be used for filters and Drops. This will default to the RubyNamingConvention.
member.remarks: The instance will use the internally.
